title: Thanks for Your Subscription !
content: <p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 16px;">Hi,dear</span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 16px;"><br/>Thanks&nbsp;for&nbsp;your&nbsp;subscribe&nbsp;U7&nbsp;Jewelry :)&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 16px;"><br/></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 16px;">Here&nbsp;is&nbsp;the&nbsp;$2&nbsp;discount&nbsp;code&nbsp;:&nbsp;<strong>U7</strong>&nbsp;,&nbsp;Shop&nbsp;from </span><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><a href="https://www.u7jewelry.com/">https://www.u7jewelry.com/</a>&nbsp;.</span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 16px;"><br/></span></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 16px;">Wish&nbsp;u&nbsp;have&nbsp;a&nbsp;happy&nbsp;shopping&nbsp;!</span></p><p><br/></p><p><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 16px;">U7&nbsp;Jewelry .</span></p>
